page.title: 04Houses In Highworth.
page.content: In this area of Highworth about 75% of the houses are less than ten years old.Houses are mostly made of red brick on the new estates and some are made of Bradstone.Bradstone is reconstituted stone.Most old houses are at the top of the hill and the newer houses are mostly at the bottom.The cheapest are Â£25,995, a typical house would have a living room, dining room, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, kitchen, garage and a garden. The dearest houses are Â£82,500 with a living room, dining room, 4 bedrooms,1 or 2 bathrooms, kitchen, study, double garage, utilty room.A middling house is Â£49,750 it has a living room, kitchen, dining room, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 garage, garden.
